title.rendered: Stephen King + Trade Shows + New & Popular Titles

content.rendered:
Stephen King

September 21, 2017 marks Stephen King’s 70th birthday. His books have sold more than 350 million copies, many of which have been adapted into feature films, miniseries, television shows, and comic books. King has published 54 novels, including seven under the pen name Richard Bachman, and six non-fiction books. He has written nearly 200 short stories, most of which have been aggregated in book collections.

Stop by our stores and check out our collection of Stephen King’s works. We have brand new copies of his best seller IT currently in stock but they are sure to sell quickly!

 

Franchise Expo

Shane and Abbey Gottwals spent this past weekend at the Franchise Expo in Atlanta. It was a showcase of various business opportunities. They made some great connections, telling everyone about the benefits of opening a Walls of Books® store!

 

SIBA

Southern Independent Booksellers Alliance 2017 Discovery Show

Some of our staff spent this past weekend in New Orleans at the 2017 SIBA Discovery Show. At the show, we learned some of the industry’s best practices and had the opportunity to network with authors, publishers, and other indie booksellers. We met Kristin Hannah (Nightingale, Firefly Lane) and Robert Beatty (Serafina and the Black Cloak) and were able to listen to other authors such as Rick Bragg (All Over but the Shoutin’), Kwame Alexander (The Crossover), and Eric Litwin (Pete the Cat, Groovy Joe).

 

New & Popular

We have added some exciting books to our new stock sections in each of our stores. These high demand books fly off of the shelves so be sure to stop in soon and grab your copies. Remember to leave the sticker on the back and return them for half back in store credit.
